name: NSPathControl
desc: A display of a file system path or virtual path information.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The path value displayed by the receiver.

items.name: func setDraggingSourceOperationMask(NSDragOperation, forLocal: Bool)
items.desc: Configures the default value returned from draggingSourceOperationMaskForLocal:.

items.name: var menu: NSMenu?
items.desc: The menu that is used for the path control’s cells.

items.name: enum NSPathControl.Style
items.desc: NSPathStyle constants represent the different visual and behavioral styles an NSPathControl or NSPathCell object can have.
